page.title: 08RESWALLIE HOUSE
page.content: The Mansion house is set in the wooded {LANDSCAPE}of Crow Wood. The house and estate which date back to the late 16th century and were used as hospitals for the British and Polish { {ARMED FORCES}during the II World War, have been{RESTORED}to their former glory after lying derelict for several years. Unfortunately one wing of the house had to be removed due to dry rot. As well as the house there a set of cottages along side an old stable, coach-house and coachman's house. The coachman's house is still lived in but the stable and coach-house are now used as storage areas. The row of cottages which were formerly used as { {HOUSING}for the estate's workers are also leased.
